name: Avikshith Yelakonda
title: ML/AI Professional | Data Scientist
bio: Specialized in machine learning, data analysis, and automation workflows with measurable business impact.

items.title: ML Pipeline Optimization
items.description: Built end-to-end machine learning pipeline with automated feature engineering, model selection, and deployment. Achieved 40% improvement in inference speed using optimization techniques. Tech stack: Python, Scikit-learn, MLflow, Docker.

items.title: Data Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Developed real-time analytics dashboard analyzing 10M+ data points. Implemented efficient data aggregation reducing query time by 75%. Used PostgreSQL, Grafana, and custom Python API.

items.title: NLP Classification Model
items.description: Created text classification model using transformer-based architectures (BERT). Achieved 94% accuracy on multi-label classification task. Deployed with FastAPI and containerized with Docker.

items.title: RAG Chatbot System
items.description: Implemented Retrieval-Augmented Generation system using OpenAI APIs, pgvector embeddings, and FastAPI. Demonstrates advanced LLM integration, semantic search, and conversation memory management.

experience.description: Leading ML initiatives, building production-grade systems, mentoring junior engineers
